prod_short_desc: Prepare for battle against the Resistance!
prod_long_desc:
Set out on galactic battles with this buildable and highly posable First Order Stormtrooper figure. Featuring sleek armor, spring-loaded shooter, blaster pistol and holster attachments, you'll be walking tall with this durable and sturdy figure.
Buildable and highly posable First Order Stormtrooper figure features sleek armor, spring-loaded shooter, blaster pistol and holster attachments.
Fire the spring-loaded shooter and reload with the extra ammunition.
Move the limbs into any battle pose.
Sturdy and durable design for intense action play.
Play out exciting combat scenes with this iconic character from the blockbuster Star Wars™: The Force Awakens movie.
Figure stands over 9” tall.
